name: Black Sails
description:
Embark on an intergalactic adventure like never before in "Black Sails," a thrilling space pirate third-person shooter that catapults you into the heart of a lawless cosmos. Set against a backdrop of distant galaxies and treacherous nebulas.
Key Features:

Intense Team Death Match Mode: Gather your crew and face off against corporate mercenaries in a thrilling Team Death Match mode. Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles where teamwork and skill are paramount. Coordinate attacks, leverage your unique capabilities, and outmaneuver your opponents in a race for supremacy among the stars. Team Death Match mode adds an extra layer of competitive excitement, allowing players to test their mettle in intense multiplayer skirmishes and prove who truly rules the cosmic battleground. Will your crew emerge victorious, or will you fall victim to the relentless onslaught of rival teams? The choice is yours in the ever-expanding universe of "Black Sails."

Get ready to set sail among the stars, plunder the cosmos, and become the most feared space pirate in "Black Sails." The galaxy awaits your command, Captain!
